name: FastFacts-MathChallenge
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fast facts
des:
Fast Facts is a fun way to practice mental math. Just tell Alexa what grade level you want to play at (1st grade through 6th grade available today, more to come), and then choose multiplication, division, addition, or subtraction. For each game, you'll have one minute to answer as many questions as you can. 

Fast Fasts will track your results and let you know whenever you beat your high score for each grade and game mode.


Examples:
Alexa, Open Fast Facts and play first grade (Alexa will offer you game choices within that grade)
Play fourth grade multiplication (Alexa will start the game immediately)
Times Table Challenge (Alexa will ask you to select a number)
Pre-Algebra Integers (Alexa will ask you to choose addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
